relationship: Referral (you had a connection who connected you to the editor)

comment: "An editor-introduced error I didn't catch, but otherwise a painless editing process. Pays at end of month, a friend who has written for them multiple times says average pay is $250 per story, which I found to be true."

"I had a good experience with this specific one; editor (who I knew from another outlet) worked closely with me and while the piece was done on deadline, it took advantage of the fact that was good at digging up background info. A good example of an editor picking the right person for the story."
